title: Big Game
creator_contributor_role: The Animation School (Cape Town), production company
South Africa. Dept of Arts and Culture. National Film and Video Foundation, partner
abstract: Monster versus monster hunter....which one is the real beast?
description: Bobo, a lonely monster, is set to spend another birthday alone, until a cunning monster hunter throws him a killer surprise party! Animators: Sarah Scrimgeour, Aarin Lehmkuhl, Romy Latter, Miro Kolenic, Jarrod Hasenjager, Matthew Furnell. Animation: Aarin Lehmkuhl, Matthew Furnell Production Designers: Jarrod Hasenjager, Sarah Scrimgeour, Romy Latter Sound: Andrew Schar, Kamil Govender
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003006; Commonwealth Connections Animation Showcase; Active; 2014
